subject: Pedido numSSN5658
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Franco Priolo,  You can place an order for the base plate using this link.Â            https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-pedal-pro-x-with-heel-plate?variant=50475339645242
